comment: lots of work, but she was kinda funny this year. Wouldn't take again cause of the workload but would recommend if you can do hard work. Way too many books that didn t make any sense
the odysseyt abd romeo and juliet were my favorite books and we got to read them

Shes really passionate about what she teaches but the syllabus wasnt always accurate or clear. You will need the textbook for sure and you WILL need to read it because she is a fan of pop quizzes. Overall shes pretty chill she just gets a little too serious for a mandatory class.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: She used to be a high school teacher and you can tell because the majority of her work is busy work.

Dude she such a easy teacher. You do get work, but definitely not overwhelming at all. Its more of a breeze. The assignments can be started and finished the day of.  If you connect with her, she'll connect with you and you'll enjoy this class. She's hilarious af and she loves when people talk. If anything just ask a bs question. You wont regret it!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria--Hilarious

comment: Such an amazing teacher! There are many graded assignments however, most can be completed the day of. Very easy grader and explains everything she wants in the assignments in the syllabus. She doesn't like a quiet class so make sure you ask questions or answer any discussions she has!
